title: Fix bug where ankhs come back when you leave the game for another app and come…
message: Fix bug where ankhs come back when you leave the game for another app and come back. Note that we don't save instance state yet, this just fixes the case where the activity hasn't been killed. Also note, SkylightOpenGL needs to be updated now to fix the rendering being broken when you leave and come back after collecting an ankh.

title: Cleaning up Android 1.5 support. Removed drawable-mdpi because it is equivalent…
message: Cleaning up Android 1.5 support. Removed drawable-mdpi because it is equivalent to drawable, which we also have. The default density class when none is specified is mdpi. Added version specifiers to drawable-hdpi and drawable-ldpi. These are needed to prevent Android 1.5 from reading them. Density class specifiers came out after Android 1.5.
